articles.title: Putin grants citizenship to Edward Snowden, who exposed U.S. surveillance - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Russian president had previously granted asylum to the former American security consultant and refused to allow his extradition.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin granted citizenship on Monday to Edward Snowden, a former security consultant who leaked information about top-secret U.S. surveillance programs and is still wanted b… [+5676 chars]
